description: This file defines multiple reusable React UI components such as Button, Field, Input, TextArea, Select, SectionTitle, and ColorInput. The components are designed for use in a frontend React project, providing styled interactive elements for user interfaces.

methods.name: Button
methods.description: A styled button component with customizable kind, icons, and behavior.

methods.name: Field
methods.description: A label and input wrapper supporting help text and required indicator.

methods.name: TextArea
methods.description: A styled textarea component with min height and vertical resize support.

methods.name: Select
methods.description: A styled select dropdown with options array.

methods.name: SectionTitle
methods.description: Component for rendering a section title with optional subtitle.

methods.name: ColorInput
methods.description: A color picker input with label and inline color display.
